sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: Workflow labels can be used to add information to a workflow.
You can also use them to structure the workflow and group components visually.
Labels are always placed behind components, never in front of them.

sect2.title: Header
sect2.para:
Use the "Header" textfield to add an optional headline to the label. The header can be formatted separately using:
Color
Font size
Alignment

sect2.title: Text
sect2.para: Use the "Text" textfield to set the content of the label. It can also be left empty, which might be a useful option to group components.

sect2.title: Background
sect2.para: The following properties are available for the background of the label:

listitem.para: Degree of transparency (0 is fully opaque, 100 is fully transparent)

sect2.title: Text Position
sect2.para: The text position option defines where the text block (i.e. header and text) should be positioned on the label's tile in the Workflow Editor.
